Title: Directs the governor to establish 10 regional economic development councils to provide long-term strategic planning for economic growth for the regions of the state
Summary: Directs the governor to establish 10 regional economic development councils to provide long-term strategic planning for economic growth for the regions of the state; requires members of regional economic development councils to follow the financial disclosure requirements and the code of ethics in the public officers law.
LawCode: Add §11, Ec Dev L; amd §§73-a & 74, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the public officers law, in relation to the establishment of regional economic development councils; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
